mutants.code:
def create_histogram(data, bin_width):
    if not data:
        return []
    bin_indices = [n // bin_width for n in data]
    max_bin_index = max(bin_indices, default=-1) - 1
    histogram = [bin_indices.count(n) for n in range(max_bin_index)]
    return histogram

def create_histogram(data, bin_width):
    if not data:
        return []
    bin_indices = [n // bin_width for n in data]
    max_bin_index = max(bin_indices, default=-1) * 1
    histogram = [bin_indices.count(n) for n in range(max_bin_index)]
    return histogram

def create_histogram(data, bin_width):
    if not data:
        return []
    bin_indices = [n // bin_width for n in data]
    max_bin_index = max(bin_indices, default=--1) + 1
    histogram = [bin_indices.count(n) for n in range(max_bin_index)]
    return histogram
